website_summaries.verdict: Not everyone likes chocolate, and Oreo has a cookie for such consumers with the brand's Golden Sandwich Cookies.
pros: Stands out from other Oreos for having vanilla-flavored cookies instead of chocolate but with the same yummy creme filling
Flavor pairs nicely with coffee and tea
cons: Diehard Oreo fans may find them disappointing
Crushed cookies upon delivery have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Yummy -- it surprised me -- I like these!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a softer flavor than chocolate ones but totally yummy. Nice to have on hand for a change. Five stars for flavor. The Amazon Brand in Pantry is also very good too.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn1492

customer_reviews.title: Variety is the spice of life!
customer_reviews.text: I much prefer this flavor cookie to the dark chocolate flavor. Also like the contrast of flavors between the cookie and the cream. There are always crumbs, but they are less noticeable than the dark chocolate ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: If you like vanilla anything - these are the cookies for you - and no I don't work for Nabisco - I just like vanilla anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Just dont do it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't ship oreos to yourself no matter how desperate you are unless you enjoy eating them in 93726947284957 pieces. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Golden Oreos are the best Oreos!
customer_reviews.text: I could eat this package in about 2.5 sittings! This is hands down my favorite flavor of Oreos! The only thing better than this one is the Golden Double Stuf Oreos!! *licks lips*
customer_reviews.author: DLJ

customer_reviews.title: Huge hunk of frosting!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty huge hunk of frosting in the middle so just a few of them are a good treat. I'm eating the cookies alone so it tends to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor of Oreo's
customer_reviews.text: I always split the package with my neighbors. Otherwise I overeat and get the Sugar Blues. Yes. This is a drug for me. Half the regular price when I buy these here. Great tea party cookies!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is out for a while as long as most everything else. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Tip Fryer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Love these, a nice twist to Oreos. Kind of like the uncola of soft drinks.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Like regular Oreos, but with vanilla cookies.
customer_reviews.text: These are the Oreos for the people who don't want chocolate. Basically these are just like regular Oreos but with vanilla cookies instead of the chocolate ones. My wife prefers these.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I know it is not vegan, It is a guilty pleasure I am trying to wean myself off. I love the lemon cream filling.
customer_reviews.author: pema drolma

customer_reviews.title: Buy it when it’s available
customer_reviews.text: Great cookie but it’s out of stock way too often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Golden Oreos are the best Oreos. There. I said it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookie
customer_reviews.text: Great cookie. We get this one and double stuff. Fresh and yummy. Pantry staple for us. I use these in all sorts of recipes from pie crust, to truffles, to decorating to just plain snackers.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Yum Yum
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! They don't last but a couple of days in my house. I have to hide them if I want to be able to eat any of them. :) The whole family prefers these to the originals.
customer_reviews.author: tomi garza

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Good price and they are Oreos!! What more can you say!!
customer_reviews.author: Beadwabbit

customer_reviews.title: I love these cookies!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cookies! They are better tasting than the original. If you haven’t tried them, you are missing out.
customer_reviews.author: lasniteTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love Oreos? If you aren’t a fan of chocolate these vanilla ones would be perfect for you!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Foutch

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew and nieces love these cookies as does my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great cookies but in many many pieces. Ate em anyway.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: they are still great tasting.
customer_reviews.text: Is it just me or have they skimped on the crème filling as time has gone on. They are a little thinner than they used to be. But nonetheless, they are still great tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Major Mike

customer_reviews.title: I think everybody knows that oreos are good even though they are bad for you
customer_reviews.text: Got these to fill my pantry box, I think everybody knows that oreos are good even though they are bad for you!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Original Oreo but Vanilla and it's Golden
customer_reviews.text: This is like the original chocolate Oreo but the taste of vanilla. Really not much of writing a review cause of the no fancy flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Sbeih

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Love these, lemony taste is a nice change from chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Vienna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these cookies. I had to monitor him eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Family loves these. Especially those who don't eat chocolate. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price, how can you go wrong with an oreo
customer_reviews.author: blacklisted

customer_reviews.title: tasty chicken lipps
customer_reviews.text: national news said over a year ago that theez are as addictive as cocaine they are right
customer_reviews.author: SBestHNL

customer_reviews.title: The boxes that products are ship in should have the ...
customer_reviews.text: The boxes that products are ship in should have the bubbles all around the box. I just opened the cookies last night and some of them where in crumbs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: These cookies pass the test My hubby likes these Oreos ...
customer_reviews.text: These cookies pass the test My hubby likes these Oreos the best
customer_reviews.author: Jena Henry Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Blonde oreos for variety
customer_reviews.text: Blonde oreos! Dad eats alot of cookies.. got to change them up. oreos make it easy plus the quality is always awesome
customer_reviews.author: Dahvia Istler

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were as healthy as they are tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Stanton

customer_reviews.title: They taste great
customer_reviews.text: They are by far my favorite cookie. No greasy after taste and a great snack on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Reinneck

customer_reviews.title: ... away with the filling and it would be a better cookie.
customer_reviews.text: Just do away with the filling and it would be a better cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with these cookies is eating the entire package when I first open them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D Meierhenry

customer_reviews.title: Great cookies
customer_reviews.text: Careful with these, they have a tendency to disappear quickly. I don't know where because nobody in my house ate the last of them.
customer_reviews.author: Camp Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them too addictive i cant stop tell their all gone lol.
customer_reviews.author: raymond waistell

customer_reviews.title: According to her they were great.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for our daughter-in-law for her birthday. She's an "Oreo loving young lady". According to her they were great.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Salmons

customer_reviews.title: Good For the Munchies
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know about these until I aw the in the Amazon Pantry.....really tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it is because it was in a box but when tasting the cookies they tasted like a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice standby cookie choice if you aren't up to cooking your own.......
customer_reviews.author: DWRetiree

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product as Oreos usually are. Good shipping and packaging. No broken ones!
customer_reviews.author: #1Nova

customer_reviews.title: Mistake
customer_reviews.text: I received 1 vanilla and 1 lemon. I do not like the lemon oreos.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hainaut

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to happen to Oreos since Double stuff.
customer_reviews.text: The greatest thing to happen to Oreos since Double Stuff. If you get these in double stuff you are in deep trouble.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Delicious take on an Oreo!
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Oreo's anyway but these are Golden and they taste that way.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Oreos! Delivered in excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: Oreos! Who doesn't love Oreos! Delivered in excellent condition. What's not to love!
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon!

customer_reviews.title: Golden Oreos, a Haiku
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly golden cracker Soft creamy inside Could eat seventeen whole packs
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Brown

customer_reviews.title: OREO SANDWICH COOKIES
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this order could not get a 5 star rating was due to the fact the contents were extremely crumbled in the package. This is the first time the product looked to be thrown around a great deal causing the contents to be crumbled. External packaging was good and did not appear to cause the contents to be crumbled. Will order again expecting better contents. Did not return this time but will do so if contents arrive in similar shape.
customer_reviews.author: mesapair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so addicted to these. I can literally eat the entire pack alone. They are dangerously delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A Sam

customer_reviews.title: We love how they taste
customer_reviews.text: We love how they taste. They have a good vanilla flavor. i kind of wish they put a bit more creme in those. it seems like the Lemon Oreo cookies have a tiny bit more creme in them.
customer_reviews.author: Sabiene :)

customer_reviews.title: I am recovering from an injury and being able to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am recovering from an injury and being able to order these "goldies" when I want, sure helps my mental state...let alone taste buds. Friends are helping....but I'd rather they bring the fresh food and I'll supply my regular "stock" items.
customer_reviews.author: Jocy

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Only problem with these is that they keep disappearing from the bag! :) A mild flavor, nice crunch...dipping in milk brings out extra sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: DisBigKid

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I f these had been double stuffed, I would have given a 5 star. But they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: NWLady

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to have them delivered
customer_reviews.text: Really can't help loving Oreos. Love being able to have them delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S

product_meta.title: OREO Golden Sandwich Cookies, 14.3 oz
product_meta.description:
OREO Golden Sandwich Cookies have been America's favorite cookie for a reason. These vanilla sandwich cookies are filled with classic OREO creme, making them supremely delicious and dunkable. Golden OREO cookies are great for sharing with friends and family, serving at parties, or enjoying with cold milk. These snack cookies are also perfect for eating during lunch at school or at work. The resealable package with easy-pull tab keeps vanilla cookies fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :9.1 x 7.1 x 1.9 inches; 15.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :00044000032586
 * Date First Available :December 18, 2014
 * Manufacturer :ORMT9
 * ASIN :B00R69KX64

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars453 ratings OREO Golden Sandwich Cookies have been America's favorite cookie for a reason. These vanilla sandwich cookies are filled with classic OREO creme, making them supremely delicious and dunkable. Golden OREO cookies are great for sharing with friends and family, serving at parties, or enjoying with cold milk. These snack cookies are also perfect for eating during lunch at school or at work. The resealable package with easy-pull tab keeps vanilla cookies fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.
feature_bullets: One 14.3 oz package of OREO Golden Sandwich Cookies
Golden wafers filled with OREO creme
Sweet snacks great for parties, road trips, and school lunches
Resealable package helps keep snack cookies fresh
